title: Finding "a"
text: The vertices are $$(3,0)$$ and $$(-3,0)$$, so $$a=3$$ and $$a^2=9$$

title: Finding "c"

title: Finding "b"
text: To solve for $$b^2$$ use $$b^2=c^2-a^2$$ and plug in known values $$b^2=25-9=16$$

title: Substitute All Values
text: Substitute $$a^2$$ and $$b^2$$ into the standard equation form, $$\frac{x^2}{a^2}-\frac{y^2}{b^2}=1$$
